overview: Karthik Seenivasan is the Chief Executive Officer of Kgroupcompany.com and is in charge of global operations.His responsibilities have included global operations, business development and M&A. He has successfully executed large cross border acquisitions in India, US, Europe and UK. Karthik brings with him a wide experience ranging from large corporations to start ups and this helps him understand the dynamics of early stage business development and an institutionalized marketing function. He has played significant roles in international, strategic development and planning in a range of public and private sector operations. His assignments through Streamline Services have included strategic partnership planning, international development and customer segmentation. Karthik Seenivasan is also Chief Marketing Officer at Official Gates. Karthik Seenivasan today, he is head of corporate marketing programs including online marketing, corporate communications, global customer programs, advertising, campaigns, events, and corporate branding.Karthik as a Bachelor of Engineering, Master of Business Administration in (International Business) & Bachelor of Laws.
